  "name": "Contract Approval Chain",
  "description": "string",
  "isDefault": false,
  "conditions": {
    "minValue": 10000,
    "currency": "USD"
  },
  "levels": [
    {
      "level": 1,
      "name": "Manager Approval",
      "approverType": "ROLE",
      "approverUserId": "string",
      "approverRoleId": "string",
      "minApprovers": 1,
      "allowDelegation": false,
      "thresholdMin": 10000,
      "thresholdMax": 50000,
      "timeoutHours": 24,
      "escalationLevel": 6415.1835833756095
    },
    {
      "level": 1,
      "name": "Manager Approval",
      "approverType": "MANAGER",
      "approverUserId": "string",
      "approverRoleId": "string",
      "minApprovers": 1,
      "allowDelegation": false,
      "thresholdMin": 10000,
      "thresholdMax": 50000,
      "timeoutHours": 24,
      "escalationLevel": 2545.320738320593
    }
  ]
}
